price: 59. Sidaasuu Alle u daboolaa quluubta kuwa aan wax ogeyn12.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: 12. Waa kuwa aan dooneyn inay bartaan Xaqa oo ku dhaqmaan ee ka dhoohan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
